m_szDocTitle: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Gains Following Budget Model 3 Announcement - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla (TSLA) Stock Gains Following Budget Model 3 Announcement By Tony Owusu | 09/03/15 - 09:52 AM EDT Reprint Editor's Note: Article has been updated to reflect that Model X Signature Series will be priced at $132K. The Model X base price will be about $80K according to an Elon Musk tweet yesterday. NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) shares are up 1.17% to $250.51 in early market trading on Thursday, continuing yesterday's after-hours rise after CEO Elon Musk tweeted that the company's Model 3 vehicle will go into production in two years.
